website_summaries.verdict: Though it's basic, this toaster may be exactly what you want if you don't need any extra features but have your heart set on a red model for a budget-friendly price.
pros: An inexpensive red toaster that's easy to use, cool to the touch, and has 9 shade settings on the manual dial
Compact design is ideal for small spaces
cons: Not as durable as other toasters on our list, as the housing is made of plastic
only 2 slots with no fancy features

customer_reviews.title: Great little toaster!
customer_reviews.text: At first I was worried because it is much lighter than my previous toasters, however, not to worry!! It is cool to the touch and it does toast quickly, which I learned when my smoke alarm went off! I LOVE the red color. The only negative is that the "mark" for setting the level of toasting is not well defined, and is very hard to see or feel. I live alone so the setting is never changed, but it could be a problem for a family. I gave it 5 stars because it meets all my needs and expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Cathee

customer_reviews.title: Cute to look at, after some time of use still toasts unevenly
customer_reviews.text: Its a super cute toaster, but it burns one side of the toast and the other side of the toast doesn’t even get brown. Doesn’t matter how you adjust it. (Edited: 11/20/19) After some time of use the burning on one side isn’t as bad, it still toasts unevenly, but actually does okay for what it is. Maybe it just needed some breaking in.
customer_reviews.author: Moo

customer_reviews.title: We really like this toaster.
customer_reviews.text: It arrived in a very snug carton. We use it nearly every day, and, for the price, it's hard to beat. It doesn't brown perfectly, but that's ok in our house. You can have very light or very dark, or multiple levels in between. It's a simple toaster...goes down and up...makes bread into toast. If that's all you need, this could be the toaster for you. UPDATE: it seems that most of the "browning" is done from the coils along the outside of the toaster. Therefore, I sometimes run a piece through twice. But then, I like my toast very dark. My wife doesn't do that since she likes her toast very light.
customer_reviews.author: Saxmo

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the money but I should have spent a little more
customer_reviews.text: The toaster works. But there are a few drawbacks. It will not hold a slice of large bread slices like Aunt Millies or Brownberry brands. It is wide enough for a bagel just not long enough for the larger brown bread slices. It takes a while to toast so if you are in a hurry . . .
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: very short lifetime for a toaster
customer_reviews.text: this toaster worked great while it lasted, but now 4 mos after arriving here, no longer holds down the toast. I invite the company to reach out to me and send a new one for which I will gladly update the review
customer_reviews.author: John E.

customer_reviews.title: Taking Crapola To The Next Level
customer_reviews.text: This toaster takes the word Crapola to a whole new level. The toaster is too small. A simple, regular-sized piece of bread could barely fit in the slot. I found myself having to cram it in. Then, when the toast popped up, it was toasted in some places and untoasted in others (and this was at the 5 setting). Into the trash it went. Not worth the time and effort on my part to send it back for a refund, since my time is more valuable to me. Guess you get what you pay for. If you're looking for a good toaster, I'd pass on this one.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline LaMonica

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this toaster works great i love the fact that the outside of the toaster stays nice and cool
customer_reviews.author: kathy ritz

customer_reviews.title: cool color, not a great toaster
customer_reviews.text: Seems like inexpensive plastic. Doesn't toast the bread evenly. Regardless of setting it always seems like it's too long or not long enough to toast bread.
customer_reviews.author: LH

customer_reviews.title: Great little toaster—great value. But is orange-red not bright red. Still great
customer_reviews.text: This the cutest toaster. Does everything a toaster should and great price. Beware of color. It is an orange-red. Won’t match my holly-berry red kitchen. But it’s okay because it has a place in the cupboard.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: hot Plastic smell when i cooked the first time
customer_reviews.text: I dont know if this was because it was the first time cooking, but mine had a hot plastic smell to it. It went away after 2-3 more rounds of toast and nothing on the machine was melted. Thats the only strange part. Its a simple toaster worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Lovely lil red toaster
customer_reviews.text: Wanted red appliance for matching my color scheme and so this was best red available and reasonably priced I use it daily just about and have no problems with it at all and looks nice with my kitchen in black and red!
customer_reviews.author: CLAUDIA M

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Can't go wrong for the money. It was actually purchased for vacation travel. Affordable & not a big deal if it somehow gets left behind.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A good buy toaster
customer_reviews.text: This toaster is a sleek and space saving appliance. It looks and functions very well. It's a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Nance

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Well, you get what you pay for. I think I paid about $18. It is so small that you have to cut a piece of bread in half to get it to fit in the slots! Also it does not stay down when you push the lever down. You have to push it a few times. Very cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen McKay

customer_reviews.title: Works wonderfully!
customer_reviews.text: It's absolutely adorable! My roommate and I have had it in our dorm for a few months and it's great. I was a little worried about the size at first, but everything fits in it just fine. Great for a quick bagel in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: It only worked for a few days and failed. Not worth returning.
customer_reviews.author: arcman

customer_reviews.title: Standard!
customer_reviews.text: Standard toaster. Works well gets the job done. I’m finding it toast one side better than other. Didn’t expect perfection from a cheap toaster!
customer_reviews.author: Briana

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: It’s a plain’ol toaster! Nothing fancy, just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: i find that the toaster does a good job if you toast 2
customer_reviews.text: i find that the toaster does a good job if you toast 2 , but if you toast 1 it will burn it if you don't chnage the setting. overall it is a good toaster.
customer_reviews.author: Snickers

customer_reviews.title: The red isn't really the red I was looking for but it works good.
customer_reviews.text: The red isn't really red but I still like it
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: This was quite an inexpensive toaster, so I can't ...
customer_reviews.text: This was quite an inexpensive toaster, so I can't expect too much. The main problem is that it toasts very unevenly. One end of the slice is very toasted and the other is barely done.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: toaster sucks
customer_reviews.text: The toaster lasted 3 weeks than almost burnt down my daughters apartment. Got A Full Refund
customer_reviews.author: ALINA ORNELAS

customer_reviews.title: Nice Toaster
customer_reviews.text: Toasts a little uneven but like it & great price!
customer_reviews.author: carol j

customer_reviews.title: Only 2 slices. Easy.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted just a simple toaster for 2 people and this one is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Toy Toaster
customer_reviews.text: I know you get what you pay for but this feels like a toy. 2/19.17 - Just saw the top of the toaster begin to melt.
customer_reviews.author: Frankie W. Cheung

customer_reviews.title: NO!
customer_reviews.text: Ordering was easy but product is terrible. Guess I should have spent more on a toaster.
customer_reviews.author: angie_kipper

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Love this toaster. Works great! And the red color is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but cheap. Best for camper, small dorm room, efficiency apartment.
customer_reviews.text: Cute red color, but very cheap looking. SMALL. This wouldn't be much of an issue, but it doesn't toast evenly at all. One side toast more than the other. I don't mind, but others in my house hold DO! Even for the price, I would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking toaster
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking toaster, but its slots are even smaller than the toaster I'm trying to replace. Turned out not to be a Prime order, so it's expensive enough to return, and therefore not enough of a refund, that I'm donating it to a local charity thrift shop, still in its box.
customer_reviews.author: well, ...

customer_reviews.title: It was not easy to find a WHITE toaster locally so I ordered ...
customer_reviews.text: It was not easy to find a WHITE toaster locally so I ordered this one on Amazon. I have not used it since I purchased it as a Christmas gift. The prices was right, looks good but seems rather cheaply made. Very light-weight - not sturdy at all but fine for the reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn M. Dion

customer_reviews.title: lightweight, easy to use/clean
customer_reviews.text: simple construction and design lightweight, easy to use/clean wide openings good size for small kitchen
customer_reviews.author: james Comer

customer_reviews.title: Overall satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: Works well for the money. Will not completely toast larger pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Gerry A. Apoian

customer_reviews.title: I have a small kitchen and I love this toaster
customer_reviews.text: I have a small kitchen and I love this toaster. It makes perfect toast, fits the bread nicely. I am very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: fluffy2

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: The knob was broken and the toast did not stay down, super cheaply made and not worth the money! Spend your extra few bucks on a better toaster
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s a toaster
customer_reviews.text: Makes toast just like it should and my house hasn’t gone up in flames.

customer_reviews.title: I love my toaster
customer_reviews.text: I love my toaster. It does what you need it to do. My mom is 80 yrs of age she doesn't need a lot extra buttons she outs her great in the toast turns the dial as to how dark she wants and it put up... Happy Customer
customer_reviews.author: Ms.Diggs

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: it is perfect for what i need it to use for
customer_reviews.author: Simone Leffler

customer_reviews.title: The top of the toaster melted?
customer_reviews.text: The top of the toaster melted. It still works but is probably dangerous given the toxic plastic fumes. This was really strange epecailly since we dont even use the highest setting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dude. It's a toaster. It should cost $15 ...
customer_reviews.text: Dude. It's a toaster. It should cost $15 and make bread brown, a.k.a. toast bread. It does this evenly and without burning. Light weight, insulated for the curious kids, and makes bread brown as needed :-)
customer_reviews.author: John W. Thielmier

customer_reviews.title: Fast toasting
customer_reviews.text: It toasts things super fast so you just have to be careful that you don’t keep it in for too long.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Just what i expected & not alot of money spent
customer_reviews.author: carolyn

customer_reviews.title: ... As A Gift to My Friend who said thy like it
customer_reviews.text: Was Given As A Gift to My Friend who said thy like it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for.Profile small for my little kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Msjay

customer_reviews.title: Great Color- Fits nice on a small counter space
customer_reviews.text: I love the color, the size of it is not bulky and it gets the job done just like any other fancy toaster that you would pay way too much money for!
customer_reviews.author: Brandy cemo

customer_reviews.title: The toaster didn't toast evenly. One side was always ...
customer_reviews.text: The toaster didn't toast evenly. One side was always burnt and the other side was barely toasted. I tried different settings of temperature and nothing seemed to make a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It works but it's definitely plastic and not high-quality. Does what it needs to though
customer_reviews.author: Emily T G

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for regular slices of bread
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for regular slices of bread, but don't try putting your fancy wide bread in it. If you only toast mostly square bread or things smaller than that, this is the toaster for you.
customer_reviews.author: J. Carll

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Simple & works great! Having a sm apt . It gives a great touch!
customer_reviews.author: BELLA AME

customer_reviews.title: Only toasts 1 side!
customer_reviews.text: I hope you only want 1 side of your bread toasted.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT little toaster
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the two of us. Lightweight..does the job and looks good!
customer_reviews.author: Connie Aylor

customer_reviews.title: Perfect toaster
customer_reviews.text: I love this toaster so much it’s perfect for a little office.
customer_reviews.author: Reaganf

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer
customer_reviews.text: Arrived early, love the red color. Have used a few times and so far works great!
customer_reviews.author: Ruthie Elizondo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Because of the wide slots. I also wanted the color black. When using the temperature of toasting was accurate.
customer_reviews.author: B Meek

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Just like with any new toaster
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Just like with any new toaster, had to experiment with settings to figure out how to get it to toast exactly how I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Ciara

customer_reviews.title: matches my kitchen decor and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: This toaster is light in weight, the black is smooth and shiny, matches my kitchen decor and easy to clean, just loving it.
customer_reviews.author: Chistine Ramsay

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: It’s cute but poor quality, doesn’t fit oversized bread like Oat nut
customer_reviews.author: Linda Mendes

customer_reviews.title: A light touch toaster.
customer_reviews.text: I like the compact attractive design. I also appreciate the lower settings that allow you to warm up the bread and the higher settings for an even toasting. A good choice.
customer_reviews.author: Art Osborne

customer_reviews.title: Simply great!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, friendly price, toasts evenly...everything I wanted in a toaster!
customer_reviews.author: Dom

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Im very happy with this toaster. I love the colour and it works perfectly. I mostly toast frozen bread and it does it super fast.
customer_reviews.author: Alba

customer_reviews.title: Cheap toaster, yes please
customer_reviews.text: It works. it's cheap. getting crumbs out of the bottom kind of sucks
customer_reviews.author: Carol M

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's a perfectly fine toaster. The seller kept asking me for a review so this is it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and very quick to toast. I like it very much.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I could not ask for a better 10 dollar toaster
customer_reviews.text: I could not ask for a better 10 dollar toaster. I am tired of replacing toasters after a year or two, so I decided to go cheap. I am not disappointed. I like that it is small - takes up to a quarter less space than my pervious toaster. The red color is bright and cheerful. Most importantly it toasts. The darkest setting gets my bagels toasted perfectly in a short period of time. I plan on buying on for my son when he moves out.
customer_reviews.author: Garrick Cook

customer_reviews.title: BUY A DIFFERENT ONE
customer_reviews.text: This thing does deserve one star (as opposed to zero) because technically, it DOES toast bread. But it's all downhill from there. You have to set the dial riiiiight above the "1" mark, about 1mm from bottomed out entirely, or this thing WILL set off your smoke alarm. Try setting the dial at mid point, first time using it? It will set the toast on fire. Literally. On fire. I've been (semi) successfully making toast with it for three months (I super-glued the dial at the magic "1mm above minimum" spot, to avoid smoking out my house), but I can't wait to replace it. What a POS.
customer_reviews.author: Gene

customer_reviews.title: A toaster with a sense of the sublime
customer_reviews.text: Well, It's cheap I'll say that. We're just going to buy another one that's going to actually toast bread. No matter where the dial was set, it didn't toast bread. It did warm it somewhat. I think that's not what we should expect. When I want to store toast somewhere, I'll just keep it in a bag where it won't get stale. This unit would make me mad if I was in a low end discount motel.
customer_reviews.author: Pete Vanderlaan

customer_reviews.title: The toaster is beautiful and worked well for several days
customer_reviews.text: The toaster is beautiful and worked well for several days. This morning (Monday June 25th) it quit. No heating element and the pop up part of the system doesn't work. I am unsure of what to do. Please advise.....It is a nice product....arrived on time...well packed, etc., As I am a senior and don't drive, it would be expensive for me to try to send it back. I would do it, if required, though. Please let me know what to do...via e-mail. I will check back until I hear from Amazon or the Seller. Thank you, Eulenna Doll
customer_reviews.author: Eulenna A. Doll

customer_reviews.title: Cute little toaster that does its job.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this toaster. I have a small kitchen and it's just me, so I didn't need any bells and whistles. It's just a plain toaster that works very well. The outside doesn't get hot, it toasts evenly and well, and it's easy to clean. And a huge plus is that it looks very pretty on my counter in my red accented kitchen. Glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: godfreygirl143

customer_reviews.title: LAST ONLY 3 MONTHS...
customer_reviews.text: Sadly, mine didn't last more than about 3 months. It was a little hard to depress the slide, to make toast, from the beginning. This morning, while "trying" to make one piece of toast it snapped off. We never used it for rolls or bread that was too large/thick... This toaster was only used once a week at a 2nd home so 3 months seems pretty sad !!
customer_reviews.author: 3 FINGER GUITAR GUY

customer_reviews.title: One Small Issue
customer_reviews.text: Love the toaster, it toasts evenly. Simple and easy and has wide enough slots for bagels. My only problem with it is the knob for darkness setting, rather than just a tiny black raised bump on a black knob it would be nice to be able to see it. I put red nail polish on mine so we'd quit burning toast because we didn't see that it was turned up higher for bagels. Still a great little toaster for the price.
customer_reviews.author: MamaMoats

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought this toaster as a gift for my mom. Her favorite color is red. So she fell in love with this toaster. Works great. Price was very affordable. Shipping only took maybe a week to be delivered to me. Very happy with my product. 👍🏾🙂
customer_reviews.author: A. Scovens-Thomas

customer_reviews.title: The toaster is cheap and acts like it. When lowering the lever to toast
customer_reviews.text: The toaster is cheap and acts like it. When lowering the lever to toast, it did not want to stay downs so you needed to lower it more than once. I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Cila Leshem

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It works and it looks pretty with my other red appliances.
customer_reviews.author: Juanita Wade

customer_reviews.title: WORKS GREAT
customer_reviews.text: WORKS RGREAT BETTER THEN A DOLLAR STORE OR WALMART TOATER, STILL WORKING MONTHS LATER THANKS, I AM A REGULAR PRIME SHOPPER FOR YEARS, I WILL ONLY EVER LEAVE VERY HONEST FEED BACK NO MATTER THE SELLER OR PRODUCT!.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Walden

customer_reviews.title: Red Toaster
customer_reviews.text: I have mostly all red small appliances so I ordered this. It’s cheaply made but it sure is cute. Browns the toast nicely but only on one side. I ordered it for the color and gave my daughter my good four slice toaster. I want it back!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rochelle McGowan

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: This toaster toasts fine, but does take a little longer than others. Really can't expect too much for $15 for an appliance so it's a pretty good price. Cord is a little short otherwise it's just a great value for a toaster
customer_reviews.author: J. Pohlen

customer_reviews.title: Good toaster. Good value.
customer_reviews.text: Good simple toaster. Works well and I've been using it over 6 months. Price was right.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen West

customer_reviews.title: Cute, nice price
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly, cute red, smallish...a little too small for bagels or larger bread but great for all around toast.
customer_reviews.author: Zendancer   K.R.

customer_reviews.title: Good little toaster
customer_reviews.text: Love it works great used it as soon as I opened it perfect work toaster !!

customer_reviews.title: Practical
customer_reviews.text: Gift for daughter’s first apartment. Perfect for a college student! She loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Tribble Fan

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. It toasts fine but sometimes I have to push it down a second time if I don't have it set high enough. I am impressed. For the price I am totally surprised.
customer_reviews.author: C. Tyler

customer_reviews.title: But it works very well and cleans very easily because of the way the bottom opens up and ...
customer_reviews.text: So far it works well. It is light and feels cheap. But it works very well and cleans very easily because of the way the bottom opens up and lets all the crumbs out and I love that it is small on my counter.
customer_reviews.author: Liv

customer_reviews.title: Cute! Does the job
customer_reviews.text: I changed the colors in my kitchen and wanted something bright and cheery. This was inexpensive and works great so far. I like the simple, clean look.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia McCarthy

customer_reviews.title: Great Simple Toaster
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a simple nicely designed toaster and I found it. The outside shell is plastic that stays cool to the touch. It has several settings and when the knob is turned counter clockwise it stops the toaster.
customer_reviews.author: Ames

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done.
customer_reviews.text: No-frills toaster. No lights or buttons. Just a hard to read temperature gauge. A lovely red color, very sleek and modern looking.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Love this toaster ive had Maybe six months now still going strong

customer_reviews.title: Fast toaster in jazzy red
customer_reviews.text: The jazzy red matches all the other appliances i bought for my mom. Makes toast much faster than any other toaster I've had.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly J. Kaeintz

customer_reviews.text: Very nice toaster for a very low price. I bought this for my desk as I like toast in the morning with my coffee and didn't want or need all the "bells and whistles" that comes with higher prices. Very satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: KuzuKuzu

customer_reviews.title: We had only one use of this toaster before it ...
customer_reviews.text: We had only one use of this toaster before it burnt out and made a nasty smell. We had to throw it out:(

customer_reviews.text: OK in this case........you get what you pay for.......I should have known

customer_reviews.text: Cute little red toaster that works as expected I just thought it’s be a little bit bigger.

customer_reviews.title: cheap and easy. Seems to work just fine for a basic ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my office, cheap and easy. Seems to work just fine for a basic model. Not quite big enough for bagels, but for an office lunch room toaster it works perfect for it's price.

customer_reviews.title: It's okay. Lever doesn't work well
customer_reviews.text: It works, and it's fast and light, and it looks good, but it's finicky. The lever to start toasting has to be pulled down like 10 times until it sticks and the toasting cycle starts. It's a little bit annoying
customer_reviews.author: Sean Corcoran

customer_reviews.title: Its okay
customer_reviews.text: It’s a weird burn orange-red, it has a burning smell even on a low setting, it works though

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my daughter and she loves it

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for city living.
customer_reviews.text: I just need to toast bread and it is nice and small for easy storage. So good for the price!

customer_reviews.title: It was a total price of junk.
customer_reviews.text: It was a total price of junk. It won't stay down to make toast and it fell a part
customer_reviews.author: Larry A Finley

customer_reviews.title: but it was boxed nicely.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift, so I can't say how well it works, but it was boxed nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Lyn

customer_reviews.title: Not quite as sturdy as other toasters but works fine
customer_reviews.text: OK for the price. Not quite as sturdy as other toasters but works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: good toaster for the money
customer_reviews.text: Works just like a inexpensive toaster should. No complaints here.

customer_reviews.title: Items arrived in a very timely manner
customer_reviews.text: The color was as it looked in the picture; therefore, complimenting my decor.

product_meta.title: Courant CTP-2701K Cool Touch 2-Slice Toaster, Black
product_meta.description: Color:BlackCourant Appliances comes to you as the result of years of research and testing. Built on innovation and progress, the series blends both stylistic and functional components to perfection. Rejoice in a kitchen made better with the most cutting edge appliances on the market. Cool-touch Plastic Housing Auto Centering Guides, for even toasting Adjustable 7 Shade Settings 1-1/4-inch Wide Toasting Slots Extra-lift, for easy removal of toast Cancel Function Drop Down Crumb Tray, for easy cleaning Cord Wrap on bottom of toaster for neat storage 750 Watts 1 Year Limited Warranty.
feature_bullets: Auto Centering Guides, for even toasting
Extra-lift, for easy removal of toast

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars263 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
